definitions.title: interj.
definitions.body: lo (of uncertain der.: only BAram. (? Nab., v.CIS ii. 186); [[אֲלוּ]], p. 1080, and NH [[הֲרֵי]] see! Here! Ab 3:4 al., are perh. allied), [[וַאֲרוּ]] Da 7:2 [[וַאֲרוּ]]…[[חָוֵי הֲוֵית]]:, v:Da 7:5, v:Da 7:6, v:Da 7:7, v:Da 7:13, always in description of a vision (cf. [[אֲלוּ]]).
